column2: The first trading day of 2022 was a breakout one for American depositary shares of the key chip maker had its best day since July 2020 on Monday. TSMC (ticker: TSM) ADRs rose 7.1% to close at $128.80—good for its biggest percentage gain since July 29, 2020, according to Dow Jones Market Data. The gain for TSMC stock came despite a lack of material updates from the chip maker.
column4: Taiwan Semiconductor Stock Surges on First Trading Day of 2022

column2: Byron Wien, the vice chairman of private-equity giant Blackstone, has been making his list of ten surprises for 37 years.
column4: This investing legend has been predicting surprises for the last 37 years. Here’s how he did last year — and what he’s forecasting now
